typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => bytes storage ref[] storage ref)

nodes.documentation:
Description: check the validity of the signature and store a patient in my clinic's storage
Params:
patient   -> encrypted patient (not signed)
hashed    -> the hash of patient (keccak256)
signatrue -> signature signed by the clinic
Returns: Boolean indicating insertion success
nodes.name: addPatient

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => bytes storage ref[] storage ref)
mapping(address => bytes storage ref[] storage ref)

nodes.documentation:
Description: getter method for patients
Params:
clinic -> address of the clinic
indx   -> id of the wanted patient inside clinic
Returns: encrypted patient as an array of hexadecimal bytes
nodes.name: getPatient

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => bytes storage ref[] storage ref)

nodes.documentation:
Description: a getter for the number of patients in a clinic's storage
Params:
clinic -> address of the clinic
Returns: A BN object that needs conversion to number
nodes.name: NPatients

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => bytes storage ref[] storage ref))
mapping(uint256 => bytes storage ref[] storage ref)

nodes.documentation:
Description: check the validity of the signature and store a visit for a patient 
in a specific clinic
Params:
visit        -> encrypted visit (not signed)
patient_indx -> id of the patient corresponding to the visit
hashed       -> the hash of visit (keccak256)
signatrue    -> signature signed by the clinic
Returns: Boolean indicating insertion success
nodes.name: addVisit

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => bytes storage ref[] storage ref))

mapping(uint256 => bytes storage ref[] storage ref)

nodes.documentation:
Description: getter method for visits
Params:
clinic       -> address of the clinic
patient_indx -> id of the wanted patient corresponding to the visit
visit_indx   -> id of the visit
Returns: encrypted patient as an array of hexadecimal bytes
nodes.name: getVisit

nodes.documentation:

nodes.documentation:
Description: Triggers when a patient is added.
Returns: address of the clinic inserting the patient and the new patient id
nodes.name: PatientAddedEvent

nodes.documentation:
Description: Triggers when a visit is added.
Returns: address of the clinic inserting the visit, the patient id, and the visit id;
nodes.name: VisitAddedEvent

nodes.documentation:
Description: segments the signature to its constituents
Params:
sig -> the signature to be segmented
Returns: values of v, r, s in order to verify the signature
nodes.name: splitSignature

NPatients(address).notice: Description: a getter for the number of patients in a clinic's storage Params: clinic -> address of the clinic Returns: A BN object that needs conversion to number

NVisits(address,uint256).notice: Description: a getter for the number of visits for a patient inside a clinic's storage Params: clinic       -> address of the clinic patient_indx -> id of the patient Returns: A BN object that needs conversion to number

addPatient(bytes,bytes32,bytes).notice: Description: check the validity of the signature and store a patient in my clinic's storage Params: patient   -> encrypted patient (not signed) hashed    -> the hash of patient (keccak256) signatrue -> signature signed by the clinic Returns: Boolean indicating insertion success

addVisit(bytes,uint256,bytes32,bytes).notice: Description: check the validity of the signature and store a visit for a patient  in a specific clinic Params: visit        -> encrypted visit (not signed) patient_indx -> id of the patient corresponding to the visit hashed       -> the hash of visit (keccak256) signatrue    -> signature signed by the clinic Returns: Boolean indicating insertion success

getPatient(address,uint256).notice: Description: getter method for patients Params: clinic -> address of the clinic indx   -> id of the wanted patient inside clinic Returns: encrypted patient as an array of hexadecimal bytes

getVisit(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Description: getter method for visits Params: clinic       -> address of the clinic patient_indx -> id of the wanted patient corresponding to the visit visit_indx   -> id of the visit Returns: encrypted patient as an array of hexadecimal bytes
